subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: I never met Pete Newell but I knew his work well, as did millions of basketball fans in the United States and across the world. It was on display for decades in N.B.A. arenas, most notably in the bodies of the game’s most celebrated big men, like Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and Shaquille O’Neal, and others not nearly as famous.
